p: In the AS (exonic sequence events) layer, we identified genes encoding exons with differential splicing between CA1 and CA3, as measured by the change in Percent Spliced In (∆PSI) values. As validation, the loadings assigned to the AS events were consistent with detected ∆PSI differences between CA1 and CA3 (Supplementary Fig. 1c, d). The genes representing the top loaded events are enriched in GO terms associated with synaptic vesicles, plasma membranes, and the cell surface (Fig. 2c, p < 0.05, FDR-corrected hypergeometric test). Confirming the association of these AS events in genes encoding membrane proteins, protein sequences encoded by these exons showed strong enrichment for overlap with extracellular regions (Fig. 2d, p = 4.43 × 10 −3, two-sided Fisher’s exact test).
